update topic
tId = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cId = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kid = #{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examdot = #{examdot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

topicConten = #{topicconten,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
analysis = #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update topic set tId = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cId = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kid = #{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, examdot = #{examdot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user1 = #{user1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user2 = #{user2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user3 = #{user3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user4 = #{user4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user5 = #{user5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topicConten = #{topicconten,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, analysis = #{analysis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: SELECT topic.*,topicoption.`id` AS topicoptionid,topicoption.`tid` AS topicoptiontid,topicoption.`option`,topicoption.`optionConten`,topicoption.`IsTrue` ,topicoption.`time`,topicoption.`status` FROM topic LEFT JOIN topicoption ON topic.`id`=topicoption.`tId` WHERE topic.`id`=25
